channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 16:49 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack! Movement in the direction of the bus station!
item.description: 🟠 16:49 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack! Movement in the direction of the bus station! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
